page.topic: How do I access or give my users access to the Web Filler?
page.description: Users cannot log into the TransForm Web Filler unless they have the browseruser permission role.

discussion.p: Access to the TransForm Web Filler is restricted to users who have the browseruser permission role. To give users access to the Web Filler, including yourself, you must grant the user the browseruser permission role.

description.p: On the Permissions tab, verify the browseruser role exists in your account. If your TransForm account was created before the initial Web Filler release, the browseruser role may not be listed. If browseruser is missing, you can add it manually. The recommended values for the role settings are listed below. Note that *[ui:Role ID]* must be set to *[browseruser]*:

item.name: Description
item.description: Allows access to the Web Filler.

description.p: After adding the role, click *[ui:Click here to save changes]*.
*[You must log out and log in again for the new permissions to take effect.]*
On the Home tab, open *[ui:Manage User Roles]*.
Select the user you want to give Web Filler access. While holding the Ctrl key, select the browseruser role to add the role to the selected user. Then click *[ui:Set Roles]*.
Users should have access to the Web Filler after adding the browseruser role.
